mapper.select: SELECT e.basiSeq, e.basiName, e.basiId, e.basiPw, e.basiGender, e.basiCareer, e.basiDesc, e.basiTel, e.basiZipCode, e.basiAddr, e.basiAddrDetail, e.basiEmail, e.basiRegDate, e.basiEditDate, e.basiTosNy, e.basiUseNy, e.basiDelNy FROM bananas.ba_sitterList as e WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY e.basiSeq Asce
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ba_sitterList( basiName, basiGender, basiCareer, basiDesc, basiTel, basiZipCode, basiAddr, basiAddrDetail, basiEmail )VALUES( #{basiName}, #{basiGender}, #{basiCareer}, #{basiDesc}, #{basiTel}, #{basiZipCode}, #{basiAddr}, #{basiAddrDetail}, #{basiEmail} )
mapper.select: SELECT e.basiSeq, e.basiName, e.basiId, e.basiPw, e.basiGender, e.basiCareer, e.basiDesc, e.basiTel, e.basiZipCode, e.basiAddr, e.basiAddrDetail, e.basiEmail, e.basiRegDate, e.basiEditDate, e.basiTosNy, e.basiUseNy, e.basiDelNy FROM bananas.ba_sitterList e WHERE 1=1 AND e.basiSeq = #{basiSeq}
